The negative of RC, ∆RC, ∆RC(-1) and ∆RC(-2) are reported in the table, so that a positivechange in reform complementarity ( i.e.a decrease in the standard deviation )corresponds to an increase in real GDP growth (and vice- versa).Asterisks( * )denotesignificance at the 10 percent level ( * ),5percent level ( * *)and1 percent level ( * **).
